name: Vampire
motivation: To feed on the blood of the living and spread their curse

powers.name: Immortality
powers.description: Vampires are undead creatures that feed on the blood of the living to sustain their immortality.

powers.name: Hypnotic gaze
powers.description: When it commands you, roll +Cool. On a 10+, you can choose whether to do it or not. If you do, mark experience and take +1 forward. On a 7-9, you can choose whether you do it or not. If you do, mark experience. If you don’t, take +1 the next time it tries to mesmerize you. On a miss, you do what it asks.

powers.name: Shape-shifting into a bat or mist
powers.description: Vampires are undead creatures that feed on the blood of the living to sustain their immortality.

powers.name: Superhuman strength and speed
powers.description: Vampires are undead creatures that feed on the blood of the living to sustain their immortality.

powers.name: Regeneration
powers.description: victims bitten three times become vampires themselves.

powers.name: Vampiric Bite
powers.description: When a vampire bites a victim, they must Act Under Pressure or be mesmerized, unable to act for a moment.

powers.name: Master Vampire
powers.description: The Vampire controls all the vampires they has created.

weaknesses: Must rest in a coffin with soil from their homeland

customMoves.name: Hypnotic Gaze
customMoves.description: When the Vampire locks eyes with a victim, they must Act Under Pressure or be mesmerized, unable to act for a moment.

description: A pale, gaunt figure with sharp fangs and glowing red eyes. Vampires are undead creatures that feed on the blood of the living to sustain their immortality.
habitat: Dark, secluded places such as abandoned buildings, crypts, and castles
signs: Pale, drained corpses with puncture wounds on the neck
Sightings of a bat or mist moving unnaturally
Reports of a charming stranger with an aversion to sunlight
history: Vampires are ancient creatures of legend, with stories of their existence dating back to ancient civilizations. They are often depicted as noble or aristocratic figures who prey on the living to maintain their immortality.
countermeasures: Use garlic and holy symbols to repel them
Destroy their resting place and scatter the soil
